newsitem.title: USA: Inference sees Q3 earnings off forecasts.
newsitem.headline: Inference sees Q3 earnings off forecasts.

text.p: Inference Corp on Friday said it expects a net loss of $800,000 to $1.0 million, or $0.09 to $0.12 a share, in its third quarter ended October 31, which is "significantly lower than anticipated."
Inference expects revenues ranging from $7.0 million to $7.3 million with product revenues making up $3.2 to $3.3 million and service revenues $3.8 to $4.0 million.

In the year ago quarter, Inference generated net income of $1.1 million, or $0.13 a share, on total revenues of $7.7 million. Product revenues comprised $4.4 million of the total and services revenues were $3.3 million.
Inference, a maker of software for corporate information and customer service help desks, said in a statement it expects to release full financial results on November 12.
Its shares were off 5-3/4 to 6-1/2 in early morning trading.
